item.title: Project for Youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert on Youtube. We have 80 videos where we need your help. You will do the following.
1. Rewrite the headlines/titles. They should be seo optimised titles.
2. Come up with a seo optimized description.
3. Write the appropriate words for the thumbnail. You don’t need to create thumbnail (the image/design). You need to write the words on the thumbnails.

While doing the work you will need to do research on similar channels to see what they are doing. I will give the list of channels later.

This is an education channel. The topic is Facebook and Instagram ads, digital marketing.
There are 80 videos in this project.

Questions:
Are you able to do the work with the price proposed?
We need to do a quick interview on Zoom call. Are you able to do that?

Please show proof of work that you’ve done for similar project(s).


Budget: $110
Posted On: June 23, 2024 02:20 UTC
Category: SEO
Skills:SEO Keyword Research, SEO Writing, YouTube SEO, YouTube Marketing, SEO Content
Skills: SEO Keyword Research, SEO Writing, YouTube SEO, YouTube Marketing, SEO Content
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: UGC Creator for New Dating App - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative UGC Creator to produce engaging video content for our new dating app. The main topics for this content will be about giving dating advice, sharing captivating stories, and providing profile tips. We would love to have you on the team!

As our UGC Creator, you will be responsible for recording short, 30-second videos based on provided scripts. We encourage you to add your personal spin to the content to make it relatable and engaging. All editing, clipping, and subtitling will be handled by our team – we only need the raw footage from you.

Responsibilities:
- Create short, engaging videos (30 seconds or less) on topics such as dating advice, personal dating stories, and profile tips.
- Follow provided scripts, adding your unique touch to make the content more relatable and engaging.
- Deliver high-quality raw video files.

Requirements:
- Excellent communication skills and a charismatic on-camera presence.
- Ability to take provided scripts and enhance them with personal flair.
- Reliable and able to meet deadlines.

Compensation:

For the first set of 5 videos, we offer $10 per video.
If we continue with additional videos, the rate will increase to $20 per video for the next set of 5.

Attached in the links below are a few examples of what kind of content we are looking for!

https://www.instagram.com/p/C5RkCDgvq3o/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C49JXUSPhxx/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C4O3eD-Nosu/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C3oLG9itNfa/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C3d0xkKvx8n/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C15eQU-PBeV/


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 02:06 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Community Engagement, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, Social Posts
Skills: Content Creation, Community Engagement, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, Social Posts
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for (1) Social Media Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to edit raw video and audio in an engaging and captivating 3-5 minute video for our social media channels. This project is only for (1) video total.

As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding intros and outros, and removing retakes and mistakes to build one polished video. The ideal candidate should have a strong sense of storytelling and attention to detail.

This project is a flat fee to produce (1) video as a trial. Future work will include 2-3 videos a month.

   Responsibilities:
   - Edit raw footage to create compelling 3-5 minute video.
   - Raw footage with be a service explainer style video. Capture with a web cam and Yeti microphone.
   - Add intros and outros with company branding and call to action
   - Ensure videos are optimized for social media platforms

   Skills:
   - Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
   - Strong understanding of video formats and codecs
   - Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices
   - Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 23, 2024 02:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Video Creation for Conference Booth - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video creator to help us develop a short video for our conference booth. The video will serve as a demonstration of our AI education product. The main goal is to engage and captivate booth visitors, showcasing the value and benefits of our product in an impactful and concise manner. The video should be professionally edited, utilizing high-quality visuals, animations, and voice-over. This project has a tight deadline, and we require a turnaround time of 24 hours.

  - Video editing
  - Animation
  - Storyboarding
  - Scriptwriting

item.title: Video Editor For Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
This position will be Remote/Contract.

Our store is looking for a creative, storytelling video editor to help grow our e-commerce brand and scale our paid social channels. This is a dream role for a superstar creator who is ready to take their skills learned at an agency or another brand and put them to use for a fast-growing company!

Are you passionate about storytelling and creating?

Do you love the process of creating fun short 8-15 second videos from content already provided?

Are you excited by the opportunity to join an in-house team and play a pivotal role in growing a direct-to-consumer brand?

Who We Are:

Our brand is a rapidly growing direct-to-consumer e-commerce fashion and apparel brand. We believe in developing beautiful fashion clothing for expecting mothers in their 2nd or 3rd trimester

We are currently in an exciting chapter of our company’s growth as we continue to grow our business by adding new styles and scaling up existing best sellers. We are on a mission to become a major force in the plus size market–and we are looking for talented, driven individuals like you to join us on this journey.

Outcomes

Create 10 videos on weekly basis that have different messages, hooks, and stories. You will be given the main idea/headline, and will be given access to our library of creatives as well as examples to come up with stories and short 5-30 second videos to drive traffic to our site.

As the first line of your application, put purple pigeon 2024 or your application will not get read.

Use our creative library as well as stock videos and images to create ads. We will always be getting new video content.

Strategize and iterate based on marketing and advertising efforts to improve advertising for results

Input and/or lead ad content development and testing strategy with influencer team and video creation team and collaborate with the content team to produce high-performing, engaging paid social creatives


Competencies

The Ideal Candidate for This Position:

Is passionate about Creative storytelling
Is highly organized, motivated, strategic, and analytical
Has a firm grasp on advertising fundamentals and direct response advertising
Has an obsession for learning new things and is constantly looking to improve


Who This Is NOT for:

Someone who thinks that learning is over when school is over
Someone who is only motivated by a manager instructing him or her on what to do
Someone who is not obsessed with analyzing and understanding data
Someone who does not value documentation and process when it comes to ad optimization and reporting

As the first line of your application, put I am a real person 2021 or your application will not get read.

Benefits:

Flexible schedule and laidback work environment with option to be fully remote

If you share our core values and everything above excites you, then we are the perfect place for you:

We care about the customer
We never stop learning and striving for excellence
We strive for consistency and attention to detail
We are passionate about our work
We are solvers who take a “can do” approach
We treat people with respect
We maintain accountability and integrity

In your application

Please

Answer the following questions

1.What are your career goals?

2.What are you really good at professionally?

3.What are you not good at or not interested in doing professionally?

4.Who were your last five bosses, and how will they rate your performance on a 1-10 scale when we talk to them?

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 01:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Photographer/Videographer Needed For Med Spa Event In Miami On June 25th - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented photographer/videographer to capture content for Instagram and Tik Tok at a med spa event in Coral Gables on June 25th from 6-9 pm. The ideal candidate must be located in the Miami area and have experience with capturing high-quality photos and videos for social media platforms.

Requirements:
- Located in Miami area
- Experience with content creation for Instagram and Tik Tok
- Ability to capture high-quality photos and videos
- Available on June 25th from 6-9 pm

If you are creative, reliable, and passionate about photography/videography, we would love to hear from you! Please include samples of your previous work in your proposal.

We look forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $60.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 01:01 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Fashion & Beauty, Photography, Videography, Video Editing, Photo Editing
